output.sentences: On the ride to the beach, baby didn't look amused.
He didn't understand that exploring the beach would be much fun when they arrived.
It was tiring to have to carry him the entire time, but it was worth it.
We stopped and asked a couple to take our picture while heading home for the family sunday dinner.
Before leaving, we put baby back in the stroller that was waiting on the pavement, and took a pic that we like a  lot.
